author: cmlenz
msg: Change Container.setWarFile(File) to Container.setDeployableFile(File), in preparation for EAR support

author: cmlenz
msg: Assert the versions of the cactified deployment descriptors

author: cmlenz
msg: Adapt tests to the fact that 'srcfile' is now optional.
Add tests for the use of <cactifywar> without a 'srcfile' attribute

author: cmlenz
msg: Make the 'srcfile' attribute optional, so that a new cactified WAR can be created without a preexisting WAR.
This is useful for EJB applications that should be tested with Cactus, but do not have a web app.
Also add a 'version' attribute that must be specified if the 'srcfile' attribute is omitted, to specify the web-app version of the WAR to create (2.2 or 2.3).
